query.statement: SELECT B.UPJANG, (SELECT UPJANGNM FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = B.UPJANG) UPJANGNM, A.CLS4_CODE, A.CLS4_NAME CLS4_CODENM, (SELECT MAP_CD FROM MAS_HMR_MAP WHERE MAP_GUBUN = '001' AND CLS4_CODE = A.CLS4_CODE) MAP_CD_A, (SELECT MAP_CD FROM MAS_HMR_MAP WHERE MAP_GUBUN = '002' AND CLS4_CODE = A.CLS4_CODE) MAP_CD_B, (SELECT MAP_CD FROM MAS_HMR_MAP WHERE MAP_GUBUN = '003' AND CLS4_CODE = A.CLS4_CODE) MAP_CD_C, (SELECT CLS1_NAME FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS1 WHERE CLS1_CODE = A.CLS1_CODE) CLS1_CODENM, (SELECT CLS2_NAME FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS2 WHERE CLS2_CODE = A.CLS2_CODE) CLS2_CODENM, (SELECT CLS3_NAME FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS3 WHERE CLS3_CODE = A.CLS3_CODE) CLS3_CODENM, B.START_DATE, B.END_DATE, B.SALE_PRICE BEFORE_SALE_PRICE, 0 AFTER_SALE_PRICE, B.PRC_DESC FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS4 A ,( SELECT C.UPJANG, C.CLS4_CODE, C.START_DATE, C.END_DATE, C.SALE_PRICE, C.PRC_DESC FROM MAS_HMR_PRICE C ,( SELECT UPJANG, CLS4_CODE, MAX(START_DATE) START_DATE FROM MAS_HMR_PRICE WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND START_DATE BETWEEN '19000101' AND #START_DATE# GROUP BY UPJANG, CLS4_CODE ) D WHERE C.UPJANG = D.UPJANG AND C.CLS4_CODE = D.CLS4_CODE AND C.START_DATE = D.START_DATE ) B WHERE A.CLS4_CODE = B.CLS4_CODE ORDER BY A.CLS4_CODE
